weekly_top_story.headline: House passes GOP healthcare bill aimed at reducing premiums but sparks partisan battle over ACA subsidies
weekly_top_story.summary: The Republican-led House approved a healthcare package intended to lower premiums by about 11%, but the measure intensifies conflict over extension of ACA premium tax credits and leaves coverage uncertainty for millions, making it a major near-term policy and market risk for providers and insurers
weekly_top_story.source: The National Desk / WLOS reporting aggregated by video coverage

stories.headline: Senate votes down competing plans to extend ACA premium tax credits as marketplaces face imminent premium spikes
stories.summary: Senators rejected rival proposals to continue enhanced ACA premium tax credits ahead of planned expiration, increasing the likelihood of substantial premium increases and enrollment disruption for patients and health systems
stories.source: Alston & Bird – Health Care Week in Review (Dec. 12, 2025)

stories.headline: FDA drug chief resigns amid lawsuit alleging political interference in pharmaceutical oversight
stories.summary: The FDA's top drug official resigned following a lawsuit that accuses political actors of unduly influencing drug review and regulatory decisions, raising governance and trust questions that could affect drug approvals and industry relations
